page.title: 05MY SCHOOL
page.content:
Most if the children who live in the area go to the schools at Kingsbridge or Loddiswell. There use to be a small school at Goveton but that was closed in 1927.
My school is very nice because it is fun to be there.I see all my friends and learn lots of things. We start at 9 o'clock in the morning and finish at 3.30.I stay and have a school lunch which saves my Mum having to pick me up at lunchtime. We read a lot,do maths,problems and different projects. We have a workshop where there is science and art work to do. There are ten teachers for our school and there are about 320 children.They are aged between 5 and 11.When we are 11 we will go to the big Comprehensive school.
